text: Thus saith Jehovah, the Redeemer of Israel, <FI>and<Fi> his Holy One, to him whom man despiseth, to him whom the nation abhorreth, to a servant of rulers: Kings shall see and arise; princes, and they shall worship; because of Jehovah that is faithful, <FI>even<Fi> the Holy One of Israel, who hath chosen thee.
name: Isaiah 49:7
